title: The FOX FLOAT X Air Shock and DHX Coil Shock are all-new for 2022
content:
FOX have introduced two entirely new shocks for 2022. The first is the FOX FLOAT X Air Shock, said to deliver heavyweight features in a lightweight package to meet the demands of aggressive trail riders, combining sophisticated damping and fade free performance in a light weight chassis with outstanding structural integrity. The second? That would [â€¦]

The post The FOX FLOAT X Air Shock and DHX Coil Shock are all-new for 2022 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
